Issue.creator: xwu
Issue.summary: orderer org should not have OrdererAddresses in it's Values
Issue.description: In common.Config, an orderer org's Values (map string *cb.ConfigValue) can only have MSP or Endpoints as its key. However, in the pkg/config/example_test.go file, the function fetchChannelConfig returns a Config with an orderer org OrdererOrg, but the OrdererOrg's Values has a key of "OrdererAddresses". That is the mistake.
